title: Was Teenager Juliane Koepcke the Lone Survivor of a 1971 Plane Crash?
subtitle: The amazing survival story of 17-year-old Juliane Koepcke has been the subject of a book, movie, and documentary.
author: Dan Evon
vclaim: Juliane Koepcke survived 10 days alone in the Amazon rainforest after falling nearly two miles during a plane crash.
